original_title: Intervenção – Amor Não Quer Dizer Grande Coisa
overview: “The state of exception and enmity have become the normative basis for the right to kill. In these situations, power (which is not necessarily a state power) makes continuous reference and invokes exception, urgency and a fictionalized version of the enemy ”. Achille Mbembe
title: Intervenção – Amor Não Quer Dizer Grande Coisa
